org.apache.lens.cli.commands

Class LensConnectionCommands

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.lens.cli.commands.BaseLensCommand
      • org.apache.lens.cli.commands.LensConnectionCommands
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.shell.core.CommandMarker, org.springframework.shell.core.ExecutionProcessor

    @Component
@UserDocumentation(title="Session management",
                   description="Opening the lens CLI shell is equivalent to open a session with lens server.This section provides all the commands available for in shell which are applicable for the full session.")
public class LensConnectionCommands
extends BaseLensCommand
    The Class LensConnectionCommands.
